top_comment.text:
Egg yolks, entire ball of cheese, grated cheese and deep fried. How much 
more unhealthy can this food get. But I guess if you want to eat delicious 
food you have to bear some burden. Anyway I'd rather eat not so healthy but 
delicious food than to eat things that taste like cardboard.﻿
top_comment.author: smutpow

comments.text:
1. Bocconcini is low in fat
2. egg yolks are very nutritious
3. Deepfried for few seconds over very high heat so not much oil in the food
4 sprinkling of parmesan isn't going to kill you.

comments.text:
You know, eating too much of anything is unhealthy. Even munching on those 
so-called "healthy" vegan food like rice, soy, bean, broccoli, and spinach 
all year long can be quite detrimental to your bone and muscle.

Also, there's literally thousands of fat-free, carb-free, sodium-free 
spices and creative cooking techniques out there, and you're complaining 
about good food tasting like cardboard? You must be one of those people who 
can turn even prime sirloin steak into cardboard...

comments.text:
其實可以考慮的，現代人對「食譜」跟「學做菜」的需求可從來沒少過（不然怎會有這則「邪惡」的教學影片出現？）。你的文章介紹跟照片內容都很詳實，您本身也喜歡下廚，很有機會把興趣當副業發展（順便造福廣大鄉民）的。 
:)
comments.author: Lamplighter 點燈夫

comments.text:
沒有計畫出食譜耶.

如今的女孩,寧願煮擺盤漂亮的洋式,像這種費工傳統..我想..沒有人會想要學了吧!

comments.text: 有一種作法是買來現成（蛋黃未全熟）的溫泉蛋（或是皮蛋），裹上一層薄粉後直接炸到略呈金黃色就起鍋，外酥內軟很好吃。白煮蛋直接裹粉炸也可以，另有一種風味。

captions.text: Hi lovely people of Food Tube channel. I was
in Soctland the other day and  had this fantastic scotch egs.
Then I dreamed and I made Italian scotch eggs.
And now we're gonna do it! I never made it before, so it might not works.
If it works we're going to have a double fine!
So l boiled some hard-boiled eggs
Never chuck away anything
We're going to eat this later on.
Mix those with a little bit of salt inside.
Not too much, a little bit
of pepper
And grated of Parmesan, and now we start the Italian way.
I love plenty.
The best tool is your hands. Mis it together, fantastico.
Mozarella!
Little mozarella bite.

Open up and the milk has come out, it is
the most dangerous one
because I don't want too much milk, now we're going to start to get some. Come on, come on, come on.
Come on
You put it inside.
Close it properly
Now, flour.
Now it look like an egg. So far, so good. Here, I have an egg again
Double yolk! I ask for one eggs,
instead it gives me two! Double yolks. That's good"
I love it. Anyway, a little seasoning with a little bit of salt.
and pepper. Mix it,
get the egg, cover,
cover, drop it in breadcrumb
Three times should be okay.
Now, we gots, Italian scotch eggs.
So far, so good!
This is for real, if I tell you this is for real
if it was a dream, I never made it
before so I dunno now if it will be working or
not.
Here it goes. Don't split, don't split! I don't want you to melt the mozarella
while you are still inside!
HALLELUJAH! Hallelujah! Stay there, stay there don't move
Yes, yes the Parmesan. Put it on a plate.
Now, listen to me
be good
yeah
Look at that! I just love it!
Little bit of

Parmesan, you can see the double
coated
on the breadcrumbs. The mozarella almost melted.
The yolk of eggs, all fried and nice. And now
is the moment of truth
Mmmm.
Why?! Hold on a minute
yeah
Why am I cooking so good?!
Lovely people of food tube channel, keeping watching me
Write in to us!
This was done for real, this was not made before.
This was a dream and it come true! I love you.

title: Incredible Italian Scotch Egg | Gennaro Contaldo
